alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 05 at 10:17PM EST until February 06 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... The Kentucky River near Ravenna, affecting Estill County. For the Kentucky River...including Ravenna...elevated river levels are occurring. ...A FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...High water caused by excessive rainfall persists. * WHERE...The advisory is for the Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...The advisory is in effect until early Sunday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM EST Saturday the stage was 18.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 14.0 feet by Thursday morning. - Action stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Listen to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for updated information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by 10 AM Sunday.
